availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Leitchfield, Kentucky, cabinetmaker. Kentucky native. Married to Ophelia Ewell Caplinger on June 19, 1855. Father of Samuel T. Caplinger, Mary C. Caplinger, M. E. Caplinger, and M. E. Caplinger. Resident of Grayson County in 1850. Cabinetmaker in Leitchfield in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 393. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Leitchfield, p. 3. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Litchfield, p. 74. _ Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910)_, microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Shelby County, Marriages, 1855, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
